name: City Animals Mobile
description: Forest animals run wild in the city! Get points by feeding apples to the animals, but must avoid the obstacles on your way. If you collide with an obstacle or animal you'll lose 1 life, get extra lifes by colliding with the potions. If you lose 1 life with 0 extra lifes, is game over. Move your avatar with the Joystick, use the blue button to jump over, feed the animals with the up green button, and destroy the rocks with the red button but the bombs won't work on fences. Be carefull not to throw bombs to animals! Get great score and beat the previous best player!
